label: Assertion
comment: A statement that user needs of the present are met without compromising the needs of future generations.

objectProperties.comment: A referenced standard applicable to this sustainability assertion.
A textual description of this sustainability assertion.
The code specifying the description for this sustainability assertion.
An identifier of this sustainability assertion.
An identifier of a party issuing this sustainability assertion.
A compliance policy related to this sustainability assertion.
The code specifying the status of this sustainability assertion.

referencedBy.comment: A sustainability assertion included on this product label.
A sustainability assertion obtained by means of this specified inspection result.
